entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5 except minus 8 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5 except minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:57 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:57 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
